price: Dájúdájú ẹnì kọ̀ọ̀kan wọn ni Olúwa rẹ yóò san ní ẹ̀san iṣẹ́ wọn. Dájúdájú Òun ni Alámọ̀tán nípa ohun tí wọ́n ń ṣe níṣẹ́.
arabic: وَإِنَّ كُلّٗا لَّمَّا لَيُوَفِّيَنَّهُمۡ رَبُّكَ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِمَا يَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna kullan lammā layuwaffiyannahum rabbuka aʿmālahum innahu bimā yaʿmalūna khabīrun
translations: surely will pay them in full
